original_title: Les Plus Grands Ballets par Le Théâtre Du Bolchoi
overview: The most complete DVD program for the Ballets addicts! 2 hours with the star dancers from Bolshoi and Marinsky theater! The legendary dancers Plisseskaia and Vassiliev with the most rare shootings. First issue on DVD !
title: Les Plus Grands Ballets par Le Théâtre Du Bolchoi
